explanation: The page provides information on ordering fishing licenses for 2023 through the new Webshop EFJ2.
The page describes the Humusbilanz-Tool developed by Agroscope for assessing soil quality in agriculture through humus balance calculations.
The page provides a guide for employers on how to complete and submit the withholding tax statement online.
The page mentions the ongoing total revision of the manual for tax register managers, with reference to the new tax software NEST.
The page provides information on eTax Solothurn, an online platform for filling and submitting tax declarations.
The page details the electronic land register and the application Intercapi, which provides access to land register data for authorized entities.
The page introduces the eTax training environment, designed specifically for schools in the Canton of Solothurn to use as a training resource.
The page provides information for garage partners on how to reserve inspection appointments using the cari Online Dispo system.
The page provides details on EGI, an online system for applying for waste disposal permits.
The page provides instructions and accounting guidelines for municipalities and church communities for the tax closing process using NEST.
The page provides a guide on how to register and log in to eTax Solothurn, including steps for account creation and troubleshooting.
The page offers video tutorials for using QGIS software, including data transformation and map creation techniques.
The page provides templates and documents for municipal administrations to use for political rights activities, such as elections and voting, but does not link to or explain specific software.
The page provides guidelines for municipalities on processing e-movement reports within the eUmzug system.
